newsitem.title: USA: Health Outcomes posts Q3 profit. [CORRECTED 22:35 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Health Outcomes posts Q3 profit. [CORRECTED 22:35 GMT]

text.p: (Corrects headline to delete reference to year-ago loss)
Health Outcomes Management Inc said Monday a solid earnings performance in the third quarter ended November 30 stemmed primarily from one-time revenue rather than from continuing agreements.
The company reported net income of $118,426 in the period, compared with $8,893 a year ago. Revenues totaled $759,116, down from $792,489 in the third quarter of 1995.

"We are very actively exploring three major business alliances," said William Peter, Health Outcomes president and chief executive officer. The alliances would add significantly to the company's growth if they are completed, he added.
Health Outcomes provides computer tracking software and services to the health care industry.
